creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: fan with calligraphy on one side and painting of flowering tree branch, with brown, red and yellow flowers, on other side; one area of text on painting side
medium: Ink and colors on paper, wood
text: The pomegranates represent vigorous fertility because of the fruit's numerous seeds--a pun implying sons. The image in art, therefore, is imbued with a good wish for numerous offspring.
title: Pomegranates
